title: Interpretation of dreams about a dog bite in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite in a dream for a single or married woman. It is one of the dreams that clearly causes fear, anxiety, and feelings of tension in the dreamer, but the dog in the dream refers to a loyal friend, but the interpretation of the events that the priest narrates when he came and died in the dream varies, and different interpretations relate to the dream of the dog, which is He bites in a dream, which may be a good sign and good news for the knower, and perhaps he has bad skin and this will be reflected in his life, and in our article we will shed light on the interpretation of a dream of a dog biting in a dream for single and married women.Interpretation of a dream of a dog biting a dog in a dreamInterpretation scholars have indicated that the dream Being bitten by a dog in a dream carries a number of interpretations and interpretations, according to the social status of the fortuneteller and the circumstances she is going through in her life, and among the most important interpretations that came. In this section: Imam Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer sees in a dream a dog biting him, this means that the dreamer is exposed to serious harm that will befall him from a close person. Whereas if a girl sees in her dream that a dog is biting her in her dream, this indicates that she will be deceived by her lover. In the near future. Al-Nabulsi explained that if the dreamer sees a dog biting him in a dream, this means that the dreamer will be harmed by the enemy. However, if the dreamer sees during his sleep a dog biting him in his sleep, this is evidence that the dreamer will be robbed and he must take caution and caution, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of seeing a dog He bites a married woman in a dream. Interpretations of dreams are related to the married woman in her married life and her relationship with her husband and children, as it can come with a good interpretation and good news for her, and it can be a bad omen and a warning sign for her. The most important interpretations given: If a married woman sees a dog biting her during her sleep, this indicates that the person in her life is corrupt. Also, if a married woman sees a dog in her dream, this indicates her husband’s betrayal and she seeks a divorce from him as well. Whereas if a married woman sees a gray dog ​​in her dream, This indicates the presence of an unfair person in her personal life who is close to her. If a married woman sees a brown dog in her dream, this may be a sign that there is a person in her life who hates her, is jealous of her, and also angers her. If a married woman sees in her dream that more than one dog is biting her, This indicates the presence of many bad friends who do not wish her well, and God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of the dream of washing clothes for single, married and divorced women by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail. Interpretation of the dream of a dog that bit a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a dog bite in The dream carries many interpretations, as they differ depending on the social status of the dreamer, in addition to the circumstances of the dreamer’s life and the events that occurred in the dream, and we present to you some interpretations, such as: The venerable Imam Ibn Sirin showed that the dreamer saw in his dream a dog biting him, and this is evidence of the presence of a cunning person. In fact, dogs in dreams also symbolize deceitful and cunning people. It is indicated that seeing a young man in a dream with a dog

title: Interpretation of the vision of drinking wine and not being drunk in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of drinking wine and not being drunk in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen: The devil who penetrates a person during his hours of sleep and makes him have disturbing dreams, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing yourself drinking wine and not getting drunk in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.Interpretation Dreaming of seeing drinking alcohol and not being drunk in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that if a person sees in a dream that he is drinking a lot of alcohol, this means that the dreamer is earning a lot of money, but in a forbidden way without any fatigue or effort, or that the dreamer is earning money through bribery. But if one sees in a dream that he is drinking alcohol and drinks from it, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money. But if one sees that he is lobbying for power, this indicates that there are many important and great things happening to whoever sees him, but if one sees that He sells alcohol, this indicates that that person is trading in usury. Interpretation of a dream that you see yourself drinking alcohol without sugar. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: If a person dreams that he is drinking alcohol but without getting drunk or losing consciousness, it means that the one who saw him has a lot of forbidden money, or Whoever sees him eating the money of orphans, but if a person sees in a dream that he is drinking a lot of alcohol, this means that this person is suffering from anxiety and tension in his life. However, if he sees in a dream that he is drinking alcohol and pretending to be drunk, this indicates that this person is deceiving others in order to take advantage of him. . The dreamer will approach his Lord and pray to God to achieve the goals he wants. However, if the ruler sees that he is drinking wine in a dream, then he is far from his position, but if he sees that he is squeezing wine, this indicates the emergence of great things. Interpretation of the dream of seeing drinking wine in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen said: Shaheen: If a person dreams that he is drinking alcohol in his house and breaks the cup, this indicates that he is divorcing his wife, but if he sees in his dream that he is suffering from drunkenness and confusion without drinking, then this indicates that. He will suffer from stress and great sadness in his life. But if he sees that he is sitting with a company and drinking alcohol, this indicates that the one who sees many immoral friends. However, if he sees that he is drinking date wine, this indicates a lot of money, but there is doubt about that. It is forbidden. But if he sees in the dream that he is drinking alcohol, drinking alcohol, hallucinating, or tearing his clothes, then this indicates arrogance and lack of belief in grace. The details that surround the dreamer in the dream or those that appear clearly to the dreamer are important in determining the correct interpretation of his dreams, Distinguishing between dreams that do not carry specific meanings or messages and honest visions that come during response periods is also important.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the name of the Eid in a dream according to interpretation scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the name of the Eid in a dream according to interpretation scholars. Interpretation of dreams is considered one of the important topics that the dreamer seeks to have interpreted from the people of interpreters. We may find a big difference between interpreters in interpreting some dreams according to their knowledge. Or female, it is evidence or a sign of the name of the person whose name you dreamed about, if you know him. We will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about the name Eid in a dream according to interpretation scholars. The meaning of the name Eid and the descriptions that bear this name. The name Eid is one of the popular names for many people. Many people want to name this name because of its beautiful meaning that indicates joy, happiness and pleasure. The name of the holiday means the occasions that are celebrated every year, that is, the season. The bearer of the name of the holiday has many characteristics, including that he is social, loves to form social relationships, is patient, confident of himself, and tends to rationality when understanding. With others.Interpretation of seeing the name Eid in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many different interpretations of seeing the name Eid in a dream, as each interpreter interpreted this dream differently from the other. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained various interpretations and connotations contained in this vision, including: Whoever sees the name of the holiday in a dream, this is good news for the dreamer and happiness for him. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream the name of the holiday, this is good news that she will achieve happiness and that God will fulfill her desires. If a woman sees For a married woman, the name Eid indicates the happy news that will delight her heart in the near future. Interpretation of a dream with the name Eid for a single girl: The name Eid is considered one of the most beautiful names, as the name Eid is treated in the interpretation as Eid. The interpretation of a dream about the name Eid for a single girl came with different interpretations as follows: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is going through difficult circumstances and a person named Eid follows her to talk to her, this means that this unmarried girl will feel a kind of anxiety and distress, but it will end quickly and will be replaced by joy. And happiness. But if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is adorning herself by meeting a person named Eid and she is very sad, this indicates that God will save her from worries and sorrows and that God is with her. Seeing in a dream a divorced woman named EidWhen a divorced woman dreams of a dream with a name, especially if this The name of a person, then she quickly resorts to interpreting this name in the dream and why this name appeared specifically, and the following is the interpretation of a divorced woman’s vision about the name of the holiday in a dream: If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband comes to her to bring her back and congratulate her, or that he himself is called a helper, then this It means that the woman will have a change in her life for the better and show goodness to him. You will receive.But if a divorced woman sees that she is pregnant with a child, and names her Eid, this indicates the livelihood and goodness that will befall this woman.A dream with the name Eid in a dream about a married womanWhen a married woman dreams of a name in a dream, this means many interpretations. Married women may be exposed to many daily pressures due to household chores or marital problems. When a married woman dreams of Eid, it suggests many interpretations, such as: If she...

title: The interpretation of seeing glass removed from the hand in a dream is according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and Al-Maqdisi.

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing glass removed from the hand in a dream, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and Al-Maqdisi, is that a person sees himself in a dream being harmed or injured for any reason. His health, work, or home may be harmed, and clients give many interpretations of these dreams to reduce their ambiguity. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing glass being removed from the hand in a dream according to Ibn’s interpretation. Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and Al-Maqdisi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing glass with his hand removed in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin - Sheikh Ibn Sirin stated in his interpretation of his dream of glass being removed from his hand in a dream that the dreamer must fear God Almighty and strengthen his relationship with God Almighty by observing the five. Daily prayer and working to perform it on time, with recitation of the Qur’an as a refuge, which is the only one that comforts souls and cures every sick person from any illness or disease at all, as the Qur’an leads to goodness and wellness. Well-being. It removes everything that is negative from the human soul and that the one who has the vision must pray constantly and may blessings and peace be upon the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, and the best supplication and the purest download. Interpretation of a dream about seeing glass removed from the hand in a dream - many jurists, senior sheikhs and most scholars have confirmed Interpreters say that seeing a cup raising his hand in a dream means that the dreamer has lost something valuable in his life because of a maze in front of him. In situations from which he is enlightened, he wastes his time on matters that have no basis in truth. In his life. Some psychiatrists have suggested that the person who is harassing him in a dream removes the glass from his hand and this indicates his psychological instability and that he does not feel comfortable and safe because his mind and mind are always busy with a lot of slander. Every little and big thing lives. These things affect the human psyche. Some psychologists also mentioned that the young man or woman who sees in her dream removing the glass from her hand, Sirin, indicates that she is facing some adversity and difficulties that negatively affect her psychological and spiritual state, and as a result she is always... In a permanent state. Stagnancy and do not feel the joy of life. Which makes him not see the future with all optimism, vitality and positivity. Interpretation of the dream of seeing glass being removed from Ibn Shaheen’s hand - it came in the context of Sheikh Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the vision of glass being removed from the hand, and this indicates that the dreamer is very afraid of his loved ones, his friends, his lovers, his mistress, and everyone he loves. Fears you of weakness and evil. There is no need to worry about this vision, it has good skin. The old sheikh Ibn Shaheen also confirmed the vision that the glass was removed from the hand. This vision shows that the person with vision is a successful and superior person in his life and has a sense of responsibility in everything he does, and also has good thinking about the behavior of things. The visionary also has a high ability to face adversity and difficulties and has a strong way of dealing with the problems of his life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing glass. It is removed from the hand of a pregnant woman. Most jurists and jurists have indicated that every pregnant woman sees in her dream that the glass has been removed from her hand. This indicates that she is facing trials and temptations

title: Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a coat through the electronic vision site roy2a.com The coat is one of the important clothes that people wear, especially in the winter, and it is characterized by its length and weight as well as its attractive and elegant appearance, so the demand for the coat is high among people and in most societies. Interested in fashion and seeing a coat in a dream has many indications and interpretations provided by great dream psychologists, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, for different people such as singles, married women and pregnant women, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream Seeing a coat in a dream indicates a state of stability, comfort and security that the viewer enjoys in his life. Seeing a luxurious coat in a dream indicates that in the life of luxury and wealth that the viewer lived. Seeing a black coat in a dream indicates that the seer hides his secrets and lives a life that not many people know about. Losing a coat in a dream indicates the loss of a loved one or our Lord to the death of a close relative. The longest coat in a dream The vision was commendable and indicated peace and stability. Seeing a red coat in a dream is undesirable and warns the viewer of evil and caution. See also: Interpretation of seeing red clothes in a dream Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a good coat in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate a decent living and the comfort of the seer. Seeing a lined coat in a dream indicates the good conditions of the seer, and the ability to make a living , and the sweetness of his life. Seeing a broken or old coat indicates bad conditions, need, and lack of a sense of security and stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing buying new clothes in a dream Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream for a single woman Seeing in a dream buying a coat for a single woman indicates that she will soon meet a young man who will come to propose to her. Seeing a beautiful coat indicates an unmarried woman in her dream, there are good visions indicating that happy things will happen in the near future. Basically, the coat in a single woman's sleep indicates her future husband, and according to the condition of the coat, the condition of the husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream for a married woman Seeing a beautiful and luxurious coat in a married woman's dream means feeling safe, love, and stability with her husband and their happy life. Seeing a married woman wearing a man's coat in a dream is an indication of the strength of her personality and her ability to take charge of her home. Seeing her wearing a coat in a dream indicates a married woman for her good life and a sense of peace, care, and the help she needs. Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman's coat in a dream is a sign that she and her fetus are in good health and that they are healthy and safe. Seeing a pregnant woman donating a coat in a dream indicates On that statement of the gender of her fetus and it will be a male. Seeing a pregnant woman’s torn or torn coat in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate fatigue and pain during pregnancy or childbirth. See also: Interpretation of seeing new clothes in a dream Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream for a divorced woman Seeing her wearing a coat in a dream means a divorced woman to feel

See also: Interpretation of seeing new clothes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing her wearing a coat in a dream It means absolute feeling

title: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an through recitation in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Holy Qur’an by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the vision of reading the Holy Qur’an indicates purity and repentance from every sin and disobedience. Since the Qur’an is only touched by the purified, it is one of the greatest dreams that a person will see in his entire life. And if the dreamer was good and kind and saw that he was reading the Qur’an On a sick person, this indicates a speedy recovery. If the dreamer sees one of his relatives giving him a copy of the Qur’an, this indicates victory and transcendence in his life. And if the dreamer sees someone he loves reciting the Qur’an to him, this scene indicates the tranquility of his life and his happiness with his wife. The same applies to the dream of a married man. Evidence of the good condition of his children and the improvement of their conditions, if he is a father and has children. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an with recitation for a single woman. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is enjoying another person reading the Qur’an correctly, this means that this girl has good morals and a good relationship with her Lord. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is reading the Holy Qur’an correctly, this indicates that God will bless her with a good husband and she will get married and live a blessed life, and God knows best. And if an unmarried girl sees in her dream someone reading the Holy Qur’an and reciting it correctly, this may be good news for her and her family, Sadness and anxiety can go away, and her life is good and blessed. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an with recitation for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading a specific surah from the Holy Qur’an and insists on repeating this verse, this may indicate that this woman is righteous and that her relationship with God Almighty is good. If a married woman sees herself reciting the Holy Qur’an in a dream, this indicates her good condition, and is a harbinger of the end of marital problems and the end of problems in her life in the future. Period. If the insight in procreation is delayed, then reading the Holy Qur’an in a vision heralds the imminence of her childbirth, and God Almighty will write good things in her life and she will live a blessed life in the coming period. If a disabled woman sees in her dream that she is reading the Qur’an in a correct way, this means that she will repent to God Almighty and turn away from those sins and transgressions. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an for men. If a man sees that he is reading the Qur’an by reading in his dream, this indicates the fulfillment of his dreams and desires that he seeks. And if the dreamer sees that he is reading the Qur’an while he is imprisoned, then this is good news for him that his innocence will soon appear. If The dreamer wanted to have children with his wife, so reading the Qur’an in a dream heralds the fulfillment of the dream of having children. When the dreamer sees that he cannot read the Qur’an in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to misery and hardship in his next life. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, Leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. Seeing silent crying in a dream means freedom from problems and worries, and God knows everything that is not seen. If the dreamer sees him crying without a sound, it may be evidence of discipline in committing sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man is seen crying without a sound, then he may It will comfort him, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my mother drowned me in a dream. I dreamed that my mother drowned me in a dream, and we did not find specific explanations to see that. However, seeing a disc in a dream can be a sign of harm, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream without seeing his face by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger in a dream without seeing his face in a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she saw the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, this is evidence of her superiority in all fields. It is also a sign that God Almighty will make all the wishes and hopes that this girl dreams come true. Concrete. Also, an unmarried girl’s vision of our Holy Prophet symbolizes her approaching marriage to a person who has all the good and noble qualities. This vision can also be evidence that this girl loves the young man in her mind. She prays to God Almighty to marry her to him, and here is the interpretation of the dream that what What is going on in her mind will come true, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Her seeing the Prophet of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, is abundant good news that will come to her and her life in the coming days, God willing. I also invite you to learn about: Praying for the Prophet in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger in a dream without seeing his face for a woman. Married woman: A married woman seeing herself sitting in the house of the Messenger of God, but she did not see his face. Evidence of many good things that will come to her and her husband in the future, God willing. This dream also indicates that the married woman will obtain a lot of money. And it must be from a permissible source and not forbidden, so that she can enjoy With it, because it will add happiness to her life, God willing. As for the woman who saw the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, she gives money to many people who have no money. The interpretation of this dream is that God Almighty will provide her with ample and abundant food. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Messenger in a dream without Seeing his face for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, without seeing his face. This is a symbol that she will reap a lot of goodness and abundance, God willing. This dream is also a clear indication that the fetus in her womb is in good health and will not suffer from any disease at all. Seeing this dream is good news from God Almighty to the pregnant woman that the child will be righteous and pious. He will also be fully aware of the Holy Qur’an and memorize it, and God Almighty knows best. But if the pregnant woman sees in her dream the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, without seeing his face, and one of his daughters is with him. In a dream. This is a symbol that she is pregnant with a girl, not a boy, and that this girl will enjoy all the good qualities that resemble the qualities of the daughters of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. As for her seeing the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, while he was accompanied by one of his grandchildren, this is evidence that the newborn is a male and that he will fear God. Almighty. And he will be a righteous son with his parents, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. This could be good news that her child will become a religious scholar in the future, God willing. This is because he will know his religion well. But if the pregnant woman sees the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, and he is accompanied by his grandchildren, Al-Hasan Likewise, Hussein, the children of his daughter Fatima. This vision is one of the good visions that portends an abundance of goodness. This is evidence that that woman will give birth to twins, and they will be fair and just, and God alone knows what is in the wombs. As you can see: Interpretation of praying for the Prophet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Messenger In a dream, without seeing his face, a divorced woman saw the Messenger of God

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a tooth and its removal or loss?

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing a molar in a dream: Interpretation of a molar dream has many interpretations depending on the shape of the molar in the dream, the dreamer’s condition, and the events of the dream. Depending on the position of the tooth in the mouth, is it in the upper or lower jaw? Is the dreamer male or female? This is what we will show you. A dream about tooth extraction. Some people dream of this dream, and whoever dreams of it is affected and worried and wants to know its interpretation. If a person finds his teeth in a dream, this indicates the occurrence of a misfortune such as death or illness. The interpretation of a dream about a molar is full of details, and molars in a dream mainly indicate the elderly family and grandparents, and the upper jaw molars indicate the father’s family, while the lower jaw molars indicate the mother’s family and the woman. A married woman who sees her teeth falling out in her dream indicates the emergence of problems for her that make her unable to achieve what she wants. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth and its extraction by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of a tooth and its extraction as a sign that he has overcome many difficulties and crises that he has experienced in his life. The previous one will be more comfortable after that. If a person sees a molar in his dream and removes it, this is a sign that he has achieved many things that he dreamed of reaching and this will make him in a state of great happiness. In the event that the dreamer notices the molar during his sleep and removes it, this expresses the good things that will happen In his life which will give him great satisfaction. Seeing the dreamer removing a molar in his dream symbolizes positive changes that will include many aspects around him and will be very rewarding for him. If a man sees a molar in his dream and removes it, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money that will make him He lives his life as he wants. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth in a dream and removing it alone: ​​Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream removing her tooth means that she will be exposed to many successive bad events in the coming days, which will make her psychological conditions greatly deteriorate. If the dreamer sees a tooth during his sleep and removes it, then this A sign that her relatives have betrayed her, and as a result she will enter a state of great sadness. If the dreamer sees a tooth in his dream and removes it and gets engaged, this means that their relationship is full of turmoil and disagreements and she will soon break up with him. Seeing the dreamer in her dream removing the tooth symbolizes that she will get into serious trouble. She will not be able to get rid of them easily without the help of someone close to her. If a girl sees a tooth in her dream and removes it, this is a sign of her reckless behavior that makes her vulnerable to getting into trouble several times. What is the interpretation of a dream about removing tooth decay for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream Removing a rotten tooth is an indication that she is revealing many of the wrong relationships that surround her and protecting her from the great harm that could have been caused to her. If the dreamer sees during his sleep the removal of a rotten tooth, this is a sign that she will be saved from the worries and crises that she went through in the past. Her life will be more comfortable after that. If the dreamer sees in his dream the removal of a decayed tooth, this expresses the good news that his village will receive.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation and meaning of seeing water in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about drinking a lot of water, and the interpretation of drinking hot water in a dream.

preview.html: Seeing water in a dream for a man and a womanWater is one of the most important things in our lives in general, as it is the source of life, and therefore if you see it in a dream, it is one of the visions worthy of praise, as it indicates many different signs, and meanings in the event that anyone sees it during sleep, and it was talked about. Many interpretation scholars, including Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others, and through this article we will learn about the best interpretations that came from the vision. In a dream.Interpretation of water in a dream for a man. If one sees that he is bathing with fresh water in a dream, it is a sign of goodness and justice and that the dreamer is one of the righteous who have many good deeds through which they try to get closer to God (). The Great and the Sublime). And whoever sees in his dream that he drank water in the dream, and it was good and sweet, this means that his condition will be corrected for the better - God willing - and he will draw closer to his Lord with the best good deeds, and if he was in a religion other than Islam, he will enter Islam in the coming period. A specialized website An Egyptian that includes a group of leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Interpretation of a dream about drinking a lot of water. If he sees that he is drinking large amounts of water and is unusually voracious, this indicates that he is a long-lived person. And when he sees that his face contains a lot of water, and that it is clean This is one of the visions that show that he will always do good to his family and all his family members. Whoever sees that the good, fresh water has turned into salty in his dream, this indicates that he is going through some financial crises and problems, and it is an unpleasant vision for him. Seeing water in a dream for a son Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees water in a dream as a sign that he will obtain many things that he has striven for for a long time, and this will make him very happy. If one sees water in his dream, this is a sign of the good qualities that he is known for and that make him very popular with others. Those around him and always strive to get closer to him. If the dreamer sees water during his sleep, this means that he will receive a lot of money that will make him live his life the way he likes. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about water symbolizes the many benefits that he will reap as a result of the good deeds that he does. To others around him. If a man sees water in his dream, this is a sign that he will overcome the obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals, and the path will be easier after that. Interpretation of drinking hot water in a dream If the dreamer sees that he is drinking hot water, then they are considered worries and problems that will affect him in the coming period of his life But if he drinks and does not have enough in the dream, this is a sign for him that his wife will disobey him, otherwise there will be many disagreements between them. If the water is dark or undesirable, this indicates something not good will happen to the dreamer, perhaps the demolition of homes or poverty, and God knows best. Vision Running water in a single woman’s dream: Seeing unmarried women in a dream with running water is an indication of the good qualities that people know and that make them very famous and everyone seeks to...

Whoever sees that the good, fresh water has turned into salty in his dream, this indicates that he is going through some financial crises and problems, and it is an unpleasant vision for him. Seeing water in a dream for a son Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees water in a dream as a sign that he will obtain many things that he has striven for for a long time, and this will make him very happy. If one sees water in his dream, this is a sign of the good qualities that he is known for and that make him very popular with others. Those around him and always strive to get closer to him. If the dreamer sees water during his sleep, this means that he will receive a lot of money that will make him live his life the way he likes. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about water symbolizes the many benefits that he will reap as a result of the good deeds that he does. To others around him. If a man sees water in his dream, this is a sign that he will overcome the obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals, and the path will be easier after that. Interpretation of drinking hot water in a dream If the dreamer sees that he is drinking hot water, then they are considered worries and problems that will affect him in the coming period of his life But if he drinks and does not have enough in the dream, this is a sign for him that his wife will disobey him, otherwise there will be many disagreements between them. If the water is dark or undesirable, this indicates something not good will happen to the dreamer, perhaps the demolition of homes or poverty, and God knows best.
